sluggish.translation[0].definitions[0].d: moving or reacting more slowly than normal
sluggish.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Alex woke late, feeling tired and sluggish.
Economic recovery has so far been sluggish.
sluggish.translation[1].definitions[0].d: happening or reacting more slowly than usual
sluggish.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Trading activity has been sluggish all week.
